message.content:
I need to identify the net cash flow from operating activities and its component sub-items from the given cash flow statement.

Looking at the statement, I can see that the "Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities" is clearly reported as -2868695.86 on 2024-02-05.

The component sub-items that contribute to this value are:
1. Net Profit: 56497.85
2. Depreciation: 91488.35
3. (Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable: -200359.99
4. (Increase) Decrease in Interest Receivable: -9881.70
5. (Increase) Decrease in Inventory: -7848830.00
6. Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable: 5015020.00
7. Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable: 27369.63

These seven sub-items add up to the net cash flow from operating activities:
56497.85 + 91488.35 + (-200359.99) + (-9881.70) + (-7848830.00) + 5015020.00 + 27369.63 = -2868695.86

I'll now format the solution as requested:

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-2868695.86', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value1': '56497.85', 'sub_item value2': '91488.35', 'sub_item value3': '-200359.99', 'sub_item value4': '-9881.70', 'sub_item value5': '-7848830.00', 'sub_item value6': '5015020.00', 'sub_item value7': '27369.63'}}}
```
